subject: Hockey, Ice
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Bruins forward Jaromir Jagr inspired graybeards with his play in the N.H.L. playoffs a night before Tim Duncan and the aging Spurs were to face the Heat.
snippet: Bruins forward Jaromir Jagr inspired graybeards with his play in the N.H.L. playoffs a night before Tim Duncan and the aging Spurs were to face the Heat.
